column5: We are heading up to Onaway on Lac Seul Friday and think I remember reading something about not using live wells on Lac Seul.....only ice. Can someone confirm that? If true is it just a case of gut/gilling the fish you catch and icing them down in the live well or are there other restrictions?

You just need to make an immediate decision to keep it or release it. If you are going to keep it you must kill it immediately. We rap ours on the head with a small bat and then throw them into a cooler with ice.
